survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Sustainability Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on workplace sustainability initiatives to improve engagement and effectiveness.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the sustainability initiatives currently implemented at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to gauge awareness.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button input; ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the sustainability initiatives currently implemented at your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of at your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify awareness of specific initiatives.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of at your workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the workplace sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button input; ensure neutral option is included.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the workplace sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Text input field; allow for lengthy responses.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented at your workplace?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in workplace sustainability programs?
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button input; ensure clarity in options.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in workplace sustainability programs?
